entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .net MAUI FlexLAyout do not display correctly in .NET 7 framework with Android #14500
  • [Shell] Dynamically setting SearchHandler Query property does not update text in the search box #14497
  • Android WebView Source is Non-Functional #14496
  • StaticResource not found for key TransparentBackgroundButtonStyle #14495
  • BackgroundColor is not updated consistently by DataTriggers #14491
  • VS 2022 Maui is does not give the option for the GoogleServiceJson build action #14486

Closed

  • [Android] Slow scrolling, laggy performance #9485
    8.0-preview1
  • Incorrect layout when using a Grid with Star and Auto and a child has HeightRequest #14494
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor: System.IO.FileNotFoundException: '' on InitializeComponent() #14111
  • I tried to change picker title color in maui. but i can see still it's white color. #14358
  • [iOS] MediaPicker.Default.CapturePhotoAsync() returns PNG in which the picture's Orientation Data is lost and difficult to obtain #11379
    Backlog
  • Unnecesary files/folders in release android build #14437
  • MAUI App works only on Visual Studio Emulator #14378
  • EllipseGeometry not working correctly for Labels in IOS and MacCatalyst #14357
    Backlog
  • MAUI iOS simulator build does not include in plist all build environment properties #14306
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Tests] Move sample build test to IntegrationTests #14499
  • Fix issue using FillRule with Paths #14493
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [xamlc] fix build error for System.Private.CoreLib #14492
    area/Xaml </>
  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [android] reduce Java interop for `ContentViewGroup` and `WrapperView` #14275
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Refactor the device tests to avoid duplicate tests #14466
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Remove typo in ResourceDictionary docs #14483
    community ✨
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix clipping issues with some views #14362
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [net7.0] Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools can be transitive #14436
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net6.0] Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools can be transitive #14435
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [CI] Do not rebuild the ms tasks on device tests. #14476
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Updated Templates for Blazor apps for MacCatalyst #14196
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • [Android] Properly remove the Frame's border thickness from the measureSpec #14452
    area/controls 🎮, control-frame, i/regression
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `CollectionView` #14329
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Build Debug and Release device tests #14392
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Adjust flex item position to account for reversal when laying out unconstrained #13936
    area/layout 🔲
  • [net7.0] Fix edge case with Grids, *s, and unconstrained layouts #14369
    area/layout 🔲
  • Propagate Title to android and ios window #14413
  • [Android] Fix Entry issues with Keyboard using IsPassword #14382
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • `FocusRequest` is now a `RetrievePlatformValueRequest` #14475
  • [Core] Fix Border margin issue #14402
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Adding ContentInsets to iOS Keyboard Scrolling #14371
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
